markdownRemark.html:
Design process

Refine definition
  • Revisit core business value, purpose, and identity
  • Brand sprint is a useful workshop method for this phase.
Expanding definition
  • Expand potential keywords group with associated terms
  • Words tree is a useful tool for this phase.
Commonizing definition
  • Research and collect visual concepts/pronoun that commonly accepted and well communicated
  • Image searching and a Mood board are useful tools for this phase.
Visualizing definition
  • Sketching, digitizing the graphic and calligraphy

frontmatter.title: Brand identity & logo design
frontmatter.excerpt: Explore and build up the visual communication of the brand identity.
